title: Silver Linings
description: Seattle-based artist Katlyn Monroe's world is shattered when her fiance is killed in an accident. As the beneficiary of his considerable wealth, Katlyn has his numerous properties at her disposal. Seeking solace at his St. Lucian villa, she gradually begins to build a new life and fulfil her dream of owning an art gallery. Hesitantly, she also opens herself to accepting love once more. Yet fate intervenes again, threatening to destroy all that she has begun to build.
author: Kate  James
